item.title: Adding Command
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:351116”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=447473.msg3283995#msg3283995 date=1280083046]

erase the last “}” in the last line.

Orly?

[quote]if(command.startsWith(“freeze”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.dealDamage(98);
p.hitDiff = 98;
p.stillgfx(370, p.absY, p.absX);
p.EntangleDelay = 30;
updateRequired = true;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.hitUpdateRequired = true;
p.sM(""+playerName+" has froze you, take screeny if abuse has occured.");
}
}[/quote]
I don’t see any unpaired brackets.
[/quote]Sorry :([/quote]
I had to take a second look when I saw it, spacing the code correctly helps you see the pairs better.

@OP
The cause of the 100 error’s isn’t in that snippet

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Command
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

I got the 100 errors Error

While adding this command

[code]if(command.startsWith(“freeze”) && playerRights >= 2) {

String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

p.dealDamage(98);
p.hitDiff = 98;
p.stillgfx(370, p.absY, p.absX);
p.EntangleDelay = 30;
updateRequired = true;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.hitUpdateRequired = true;
p.sM(""+playerName+" has froze you, take screeny if abuse has occured.");
}
}[/code]

-Will
